# RemoveCustomProperty

**Instance Method**

Attempts to remove a custom property from the custom property.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t RemoveCustomProperty(IOUserAudioCustomProperty * in_custom_property);
```

## Parameters

- **in_custom_property**: An [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioCustomProperty] object to remove from the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioCustomProperty].

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnError]

## Discussion

This method always returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnError] since a custom property can’t have a custom property.

## Infrequently Used Functionality

- **AddCustomProperty**: Attempts to add a custom property to the custom property.
